statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (9,-9) and (11,14).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{14}-{\left(-{9}\right)}}}{{{11}-{\left({9}\right)}}}=\frac{{23}}{{2}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{23}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
